specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls when fighting in melee.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their melee rolls next time they fight.

specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get +1 to their melee rolls next time they fight.

spells.name: Horrify
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Barbed Spikes
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Dark Chains
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” moves -6” next time it charges.

spells.name: Impale
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Havoc Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Thorn Field
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
